<!ELEMENT TRACE EMPTY > <!ATTLIST TRACE BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST TRACE PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST TRACE SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST TRACE WERT CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST EMPTY > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST WERT CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT VALUTA EMPTY > <!ATTLIST VALUTA BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST VALUTA PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST VALUTA SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST VALUTA WERT CDATA "null" >
]> <Content>
<PARAMETER>
<UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST BESCHREIBUNG="ALLGEMEIN: UC4 Deployment Test" PLAUSI="JN" SEPPL="WIE" WERT="N"/>
<VALUTA BESCHREIBUNG="Wenn leer erster des vorherigen Monats" PLAUSI="JJJJMMTT" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT=""/>
<MANDANTEN BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="01,02,20,21,54" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="01,02,20,21,54"/> <AB_VTR_NR BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="NNNN" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT=""/> <BIS_VTR_NR BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="NNNN" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT=""/> <OHNE_VTR_NR BESCHREIBUNG="Ausschluss einer einzelnen Vertragsnummer" PLAUSI="NNNN" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT=""/> <ANZAHL BESCHREIBUNG="Max. Anzahl an erfolgreich zu verarbeitetenden Verträgen " PLAUSI="NNNN" SEPPL="EIW" WERT=""/> <PARALLEL BESCHREIBUNG="Defaultwert richtet sich nach Anzahl CPUs" PLAUSI="1..100" SEPPL="EIW" WERT=""/> <TRACE BESCHREIBUNG="Ausführliches Logfile" PLAUSI="J/N" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="N"/> <PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN BESCHREIBUNG="Stufe der Protokollierung in der Datenbank" PLAUSI="OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="AUSSCHL"/> <PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN BESCHREIBUNG="Stufe der Protokollierung in der Datenbank" PLAUSI="INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="WARN"/> <PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL BESCHREIBUNG="Stufe der Protokollierung in der Datenbank" PLAUSI="OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="AUSSCHL"/> <PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL BESCHREIBUNG="Stufe der Protokollierung in der Datenbank" PLAUSI="INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="WARN"/> <PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA BESCHREIBUNG="Stufe der Protokollierung in der Datenbank" PLAUSI="OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="AUSSCHL"/> <PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA BESCHREIBUNG="Stufe der Protokollierung in der Datenbank" PLAUSI="INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="WARN"/> <RUN_AUSLOESER BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="J/N" SEPPL="E" WERT="J"/> <RUN_GENERATOR BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="J/N" SEPPL="E" WERT="J"/> <RUN_SELEKTIERER BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="J/N" SEPPL="E" WERT="J"/> <RUN_BEARBEITER BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="J/N" SEPPL="E" WERT="J"/> <RUN_NB41PP6 BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="J/N" SEPPL="E" WERT="J"/> <RUN_NB41PP7 BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="J/N" SEPPL="E" WERT="J"/> <RUN_NB41PP8 BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="J/N" SEPPL="E" WERT="J"/> <RUN_GDVUPLOAD BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="J/N" SEPPL="E" WERT="J"/> </PARAMETER>
</Content>

row.process:
:INC JOBI.BBS.JOBPDEFAULTS ! ----------------------------------------------------------------- ! Sicherstellung der Abfolge: ! GDV-Vermittlerupdate -> DisDa-Export -> DisDa-Import -> GDV-Batch ! ----------------------------------------------------------------- :IF &IDT# = "P" : SET &ParentType# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_TYPE(ACT) : IF &ParentType# <> "USER" : ATTACH_SYNC &ME_RUNNR#, "SYNC.BBS.GDV", "START_GDV", "ENDE_GDV", "ENDE_GDV", "W" : ELSE : SET &CurrentSyncValue# = GET_SYNC("SYNC.BBS.GDV", "STATE") : IF &CurrentSyncValue# <> "DB_IMPORT_BEENDET" : BEGINREAD : PRINT "Sync Status is nicht wie erwartet: &CurrentSyncValue# !!!", "" : PRINT "OK um Jobplan trotzdem laufen zu lassen.", "" : ENDREAD : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF !**********GeneratedText, Do Not Change********** :SET &pttyp# = SYS_ACT_PTTYP() !Eintragen der READ Befehle :BEGINREAD :IF &pttyp# = "D" : PRINT "", "Bei Start via GUI wird die Eingabe der Startzeit unterdrückt" :ELSE : READ &START#,,"START [JJJJ-MM-TT HH:MM:SS]",'',K :ENDIF :READ &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST#,,"UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST [JN]",'N',K :READ &VALUTA#,,"VALUTA [JJJJMMTT]",'',K :READ &MANDANTEN#,,"MANDANTEN [01,02,20,21,54]",'01,02,20,21,54',K :READ &AB_VTR_NR#,,"AB_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &BIS_VTR_NR#,,"BIS_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &OHNE_VTR_NR#,,"OHNE_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &ANZAHL#,,"ANZAHL [NNNN]",'',K :READ &PARALLEL#,,"PARALLEL [1..100]",'',K :READ &TRACE#,,"TRACE [J/N]",'N',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :READ &RUN_AUSLOESER#,,"RUN_AUSLOESER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_GENERATOR#,,"RUN_GENERATOR [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_SELEKTIERER#,,"RUN_SELEKTIERER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_BEARBEITER#,,"RUN_BEARBEITER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_NB41PP6#,,"RUN_NB41PP6 [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_NB41PP7#,,"RUN_NB41PP7 [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_NB41PP8#,,"RUN_NB41PP8 [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_GDVUPLOAD#,,"RUN_GDVUPLOAD [J/N]",'J',K :ENDREAD
!Eintragen der PSET Befehle :PSET &START# = &START# :PSET &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# :PSET &VALUTA# = &VALUTA# :PSET &MANDANTEN# = &MANDANTEN# :PSET &AB_VTR_NR# = &AB_VTR_NR# :PSET &BIS_VTR_NR# = &BIS_VTR_NR# :PSET &OHNE_VTR_NR# = &OHNE_VTR_NR# :PSET &ANZAHL# = &ANZAHL# :PSET &PARALLEL# = &PARALLEL# :PSET &TRACE# = &TRACE# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# :PSET &RUN_AUSLOESER# = &RUN_AUSLOESER# :PSET &RUN_GENERATOR# = &RUN_GENERATOR# :PSET &RUN_SELEKTIERER# = &RUN_SELEKTIERER# :PSET &RUN_BEARBEITER# = &RUN_BEARBEITER# :PSET &RUN_NB41PP6# = &RUN_NB41PP6# :PSET &RUN_NB41PP7# = &RUN_NB41PP7# :PSET &RUN_NB41PP8# = &RUN_NB41PP8# :PSET &RUN_GDVUPLOAD# = &RUN_GDVUPLOAD# !**************End of GeneratedText************** :SET &DATVMM# = SUB_PERIOD ("&DATUM_AM#","MM;1","JJJJMMTT") :PRINT "DATUM Vormonat: &DATVMM#" :PSET &FOPVM# = FIRST_OF_PERIOD('JJJJMMTT:&DATVMM#','MM','JJJJMMTT') :PRINT "First day of period VM: &FOPVM#"
:IF &VALUTA# = "" : PSET &VALUTA# = "&FOPVM#" :ENDIF :PSET &LAUFDATUM# = LAST_OF_PERIOD('JJJJMMTT:&VALUTA#','MM','JJJJMMTT')
:PSET &PARALLEL_DEFAULT# = GET_VAR("VARA.CONFIG_EBENE", "PARALLEL_DEFAULT") :IF &PARALLEL# = "" : PSET &PARALLEL# = "&PARALLEL_DEFAULT#" :ENDIF
:PSET &LIEFERUNG# = "G"
